description.text:
(Translated from Chinese by AI)
1. Add mod/modpack translation query function (Chinese and English only)  
2. Fix the issue where the DELETE key cannot be used in the Pojav backend  
3. Refactor the download page layout structure and localize categories to optimize loading speed  
4. Fix download page pagination-related error issues  
5. Fix potential Out-of-Memory (OOM) errors when checking for updates on local mod files, which may occur due to excessively large mod files

（若启动器内下载缓慢请使用网盘下载,64位的请下载arm64，不知道该下哪个的请下载all）
1.添加模组/整合包翻译查询功能（仅中英文）
2.修复Pojav后端无法使用DELETE键的问题
3.重构下载页面布局结构和本地化分类，优化加载速度
4.修复下载页面页码相关报错问题
5.修复本地模组文件检查更新可能会因模组文件过大OOM的问题
